pageContext.claim: “In North Carolina, voters are reporting receiving two ballots in the mail. Many -- many voters. I hear it's thousands, but they're getting two ballots. I wonder if those are Democrat areas, because the word is they are.”
pageContext.analysis: New York Magazine reports "And the 500 — not “thousands” — of North Carolinians receiving two ballots cannot cast more than one without evading additional safeguards and committing a felony."
